A Truly Great Python Fail

12.03.2010 at 06:01 AM in Python, Humor | View Comments

I saw this on Stack Overflow, and I almost soiled myself with how funny it is. Without any further adieu, here's the snippet:

def my_func(name=None):
    if name isn't None:
        # do something

If The Daily WTF took Python code (it has almost never appeared on TDWTF), this would definitely make it, even though it's a simple mistake. Too classic.
